author: James Tanner
method: Heat the oven to 250C/500F/Gas 9. Whisk the egg whites to stiff peak stage. Blend the peaches in a food processor and add the sugar. Fold the peach coulis into the egg whites and bake in the oven for ten minutes or until risen.
ingredients: 3 free-range egg whites,  200g/7oz/½tin tinned peaches,  1 tsp sugar
